about_the_game:
The Wings of Dawn is an online multiplayer survival game that features playable human characters and draconic creatures set in a creative take on the Medieval European timeline. While searching for new sources of land and resources, our Colonists discover an uncharted and isolated landmass that they call Areleri. They now must survive in this strange and unique world while competing for resources with their new draconic hosts.

Play as one of two (4) factions divided equally among both humans and dragons while trying to manage your health, diet, thirst, and survive the dangers of the new world presented to you. You can choose to tackle the competition on your own or group up with other players to increase your chances of survival.

It's your decision on how you survive in this new hostile world. So what are you waiting for?

Your adventure starts on the sandy shores. The challenge ahead of you includes but is not limited to:

  • Explore and unravel the mysteries of a long forgotten civilization.

  • Study the new fauna and their ecosystems.

  • Befriend and group up with fellow players in your faction.

  • And much more to be discovered!

Legends Are Revived!

Players looking to see Areleri from a different perspective can choose to play formidable creatures and dragons. Each dragon is equipped with its own unique advantages and disadvantages along with elemental based attacks that are perfectly designed for the world they grew up in. As one of these fearsome beasts, you can never be certain of who is the hunter and who is the hunted.

Your survival as one of our unique dragons can include:

  • Hatching from an egg and learning to survive the world as a small and vulnerable hatchling.

  • Learn to control your species based elemental power of fire, water, ice, lightning, or acid.

  • Attune your legendary prowess by learning to fly, hunting, and managing social interactions with other dragons and even humans.

  • Stake your claim and fight tooth and claw against Areleri’s hostile wildlife, other dragons, and even humans.

  • Gather with other players of the same species to form packs or herds.

  • Court a potential mate or adopt young dragons to build your family.

  • And of course, there’s always more to becoming the legend you desire to be!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. Frequent Violence or blood, General Mature Content, Voice chat, player signs, alcohol and drug use.

name: The Wings of Dawn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x6 Quad-Core CPU 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX GTX 970/AMD RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
  • Additional Notes: Subject to change

short_description: The Wings of Dawn is an open world survival game either survive as a dragon or thrive as a human. The wildlife having evolved entirely differently to anywhere on earth will pose a challenge to everyone. Do what it takes to survive the day and make sure to be in shelter at night.
